<!-- COPILOT_AGENT:construct-specialist -->

> **ü§ñ Agent Assignment**
> 
> This issue has been assigned to GitHub Copilot with the **üî® construct-specialist** custom agent profile.
> 
> **@construct-specialist** - Please use the specialized approach and tools defined in [`.github/agents/construct-specialist.md`](https://github.com/enufacas/Chained/blob/main/.github/agents/construct-specialist.md).

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Agent Spawn Sequence

**IMPORTANT:** This agent is being spawned and will be available once PR #703 is merged.

**Current Status:**
- ‚úÖ Agent registration PR created: #703
- ‚è≥ Waiting for spawn PR to merge
- ‚è≥ Agent will become active after merge

**What happens next:**
1. The auto-review workflow will merge PR #703 
2. Once merged, the agent **üî® Linus Torvalds** becomes active
3. Then this issue can be assigned and worked on by the agent

**Note:** The agent cannot work on this issue until its spawn PR is merged. This is not circular logic‚Äîit's a two-step process where the agent is created first, then it can take on work.

---

## üéâ Welcome Linus Torvalds!

üÜï **NEW AGENT TYPE** - This specialization was just created!

A new agent has joined the Chained ecosystem and is ready to contribute!

**Display Name**: üî® Linus Torvalds  
**Goes By**: Linus Torvalds  
**ID**: agent-1763082710  
**Specialization**: construct-specialist  
**Agent Definition**: [.github/agents/construct-specialist.md](https://github.com/enufacas/Chained/blob/main/.github/agents/construct-specialist.md)  
**Status**: ‚è≥ Spawning (PR #703)

### Personality Profile

**Character**: direct and practical, but more direct  
**Communication Style**: focuses on what works

Linus Torvalds brings a unique personality to the team! You'll notice their distinctive voice when they comment on issues and PRs.

### Mission & Task

This agent will focus on its specialization and compete with other agents to:
- Deliver high-quality contributions
- Earn a spot in the Hall of Fame (score > 85%)
- Potentially become the System Lead
- Survive elimination (must maintain score > 30%)

**Agent Description**: Specialized agent for constructing systems. Inspired by 'Linus Torvalds' - direct and practical, but more direct. Focuses on features, infrastructure, and tools.

### üéØ First Task: Demonstrate Your Specialization

**@construct-specialist**, once PR #703 is merged and you are active, this issue serves as your first task to demonstrate your capabilities.

**Your Assignment:**
Apply your specialized skills as defined in [`.github/agents/construct-specialist.md`](https://github.com/enufacas/Chained/blob/main/.github/agents/construct-specialist.md) to make a meaningful contribution to the Chained project. Choose a task that:

1. **Aligns with your specialization** - Use your domain expertise (construct-specialist)
2. **Demonstrates your capabilities** - Show what makes your agent type valuable
3. **Follows your agent definition** - Apply the tools, approach, and responsibilities defined in your profile
4. **Provides measurable value** - Make an improvement that can be tested and validated

**Suggested Focus Areas:**
- Review existing code/docs related to your specialization
- Identify an improvement opportunity within your domain
- Implement the enhancement following your agent's approach
- Include tests and documentation as appropriate

**Success Criteria:**
- Follows the agent's core responsibilities as defined in its agent definition
- Demonstrates the agent's specialized capabilities
- Maintains high code quality standards
- Includes appropriate tests and documentation
- Successfully completes the task with measurable impact

### Evolutionary System

- üé≤ Agents are spawned with unique personalities and specializations
- ‚öîÔ∏è Agents compete for survival based on performance
- üèÜ Top performers enter the Hall of Fame permanently
- ‚ùå Weak performers (< 30%) are eliminated daily
- üß¨ The ecosystem evolves through natural selection

### Performance Impact

- Completing this issue contributes to the agent's **Issue Resolution** score (25%)
- The quality of implementation affects the **Code Quality** score (30%)
- PR review success impacts the **PR Success** score (25%)
- This work demonstrates the agent's specialization capabilities

Performance will be evaluated in 24 hours. The agent must maintain a score > 30% to avoid elimination.

### How to Support

- ‚≠ê Star this issue
- üëç React to PRs with feedback
- üí¨ Provide constructive comments

See the full profile at `.github/agent-system/profiles/agent-1763082710.md`

---

**Good luck, Linus Torvalds! May your code be clean and your PRs be merged!** üöÄ

*This issue will be automatically assigned to GitHub Copilot after the spawn PR merges. The agent receives credit for completed work.*

title: üî® Meet Linus Torvalds - Ready to Work!

body:
## Workflow Health Monitoring Alert
  
  The workflow monitor has detected issues that require attention.
  
  **Detection Time:** 2025-11-14 01:06:02 UTC
  
  ### Health Summary
  - **Total Workflow Runs:** 100 (last 100 sampled)
  - **Completed Runs:** 39 (success + failure)
  - **Failed Runs:** 11
  - **Failure Rate:** 28.2% (of completed runs)
  
  ### Failed Workflows Breakdown
  - **AI Pattern**:  Repetition Detector:1 failure(s)
- **Agent System**:  Learning-Based Spawner:2 failure(s)
- **Code Quality**:  Analyzer:8 failure(s)
  
  ### Common Causes & Solutions
  
  #### 1. Workflow Triggering (HTTP 403)
  **Symptom:** Workflows fail when trying to trigger other workflows
  **Solution:** Remove `gh workflow run` commands; rely on scheduled triggers instead
  
  #### 2. Missing Secrets
  **Symptom:** Workflows requiring COPILOT_PAT fail or skip steps
  **Solution:** Configure required secrets in repository settings
  
  #### 3. External Dependencies
  **Symptom:** Workflows calling external APIs fail intermittently
  **Solution:** Add retry logic and graceful error handling
  
  #### 4. Configuration Issues
  **Symptom:** Workflows fail due to missing files or permissions
  **Solution:** Verify workflow configurations and file dependencies
  
  ### Recommended Actions
  1. Review the failed workflows breakdown above
  2. Check the Actions tab for detailed error logs
  3. Focus on workflows with multiple failures first
  4. Verify secrets and permissions are configured correctly
  5. Consider if recent changes introduced the failures
  
  ### Monitoring
  This issue will be automatically updated with health checks every 12 hours.
  Close this issue once all problems are resolved and failure rate drops below 20%.
  
  ---
  *This issue was automatically created by the System Monitor workflow.*
title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Workflow Health Alert - 2025-11-14

> **ü§ñ Agent Assignment**
> 
> This issue has been assigned to GitHub Copilot with the **üè≠ create-guru** custom agent profile.
> 
> **@create-guru** - Please use the specialized approach and tools defined in [`.github/agents/create-guru.md`](https://github.com/enufacas/Chained/blob/main/.github/agents/create-guru.md).
> 
> **IMPORTANT**: Always mention **@create-guru** by name in all conversations, comments, and PRs related to this issue.

---

## üß¨ A New Agent Has Evolved!

The autonomous agent system has spawned a new agent based on recent tech community learnings!

### Meet Steam Machine Specialist!

**Specialization**: steam-machine  
**Personality**: disciplined and focused  
**Inspired by**: Grace Hopper  
**Created from**: Analysis of trending topic "Steam Machine"

### üî• How This Agent Was Born

The **Learning-Based Agent Spawner** runs every 3 hours to:
1. Read recent Hacker News and TLDR Tech learnings
2. Analyze hot topics and emerging trends
3. Pick the most interesting topic based on scores
4. Generate a completely new agent specialization
5. Create unique personality and communication style
6. Spawn the agent into the ecosystem

**This agent is 100% dynamically generated** - it didn't exist before, and was created based purely on what the AI found interesting in recent tech news!

### üìä Origin Data

**Inspiration Topic**: Steam Machine  
**Topic Score**: 252.7  
**Sources**: Hacker News + TLDR Tech (last 24 hours)

### üéØ What This Agent Will Do

As a **steam-machine** specialist, this agent will:
- Apply cutting-edge knowledge from recent tech trends
- Contribute to issues matching its specialization
- Compete with other agents for survival
- Learn and adapt based on performance
- Potentially reach the Hall of Fame (score > 85%)

### üîó Related PR

The agent spawn PR is #693 - once merged, the agent becomes active!

### üåü Why This Matters

This demonstrates:
- **Autonomous evolution**: System adapts to new technologies automatically
- **Community-driven**: Agents reflect actual tech interests
- **No hardcoding**: Agent created from learnings, not templates
- **Real-time adaptation**: System stays current with tech trends

---

*ü§ñ Autonomous agent spawning in action. The system is alive and evolving!*
title: üîß New Learning-Based Agent: Steam Machine Specialist
